metadata.title: CVE-2020-36049 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: socket.io-parser before 3.4.1 allows attackers to cause a denial of service(memory consumption) via a large packet because a concatenation approach isused.

criterions.comment: node-socket.io-parser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
